LanguageData.EdB.DeleteColonistConfirm: Are you sure that you want to remove this colonist?
LanguageData.EdB.ApparelConflictDescription: Your colonist cannot wear the selected {0} with the following apparel:
LanguageData.EdB.ConfirmPresetDelete: Are you sure that you want to delete this preset?
LanguageData.EdB.PresetThingDefFailed: Could not fully load preset. Check that all required mods are enabled.
LanguageData.EdB.ExitPrepareCarefullyConfirm: Are you sure that you do not want to Prepare Carefully? Any changes that you made will be lost.
LanguageData.EdB.PointsBalancedStartTip: Enable points if you want to maintain a balanced start by paying for skills, additional colonists and equipment from a fixed number of points. Or disable points entirely to set up your starting colonists however you'd like!
LanguageData.EdB.PresetPawnLoadFailed: Failed to load colonists from the preset. Check that all required mods are enabled.
LanguageData.EdB.PresetIncompatible: Failed to load colonists from the preset. Was the preset created with an earlier version of the game?
LanguageData.EdB.BackstoryWarning: The description for this backstory may not match the name and/or gender that you've selected for this colonist.
LanguageData.EdB.ConfirmColonistDelete: Are you sure that you want to delete this colonist?
LanguageData.EdB.ColonistLoadFailed: Failed to load colonist. Check that all required mods are enabled.
LanguageData.EdB.TooManyColonists: Cannot start with more than {0} colonists.
LanguageData.EdB.ColonistThingDefFailed: Could not fully load colonist. Check that all required mods are enabled.
LanguageData.EdB.PrepareCarefully.TooManyColonists: You are not allowed to have more than {0} colonists.
LanguageData.EdB.PrepareCarefully.TooManyColonists1: You are not allowed to have more than 1 colonist.
LanguageData.EdB.PrepareCarefully.NotEnoughColonists: You must have at least {0} colonists.
LanguageData.EdB.PrepareCarefully.NotEnoughColonists1: You must have at least 1 colonist.
LanguageData.EdB.PrepareCarefully.ResetSkills: Reset skills and passions to their original values
LanguageData.EdB.PrepareCarefully.UsePoints.Tip: Enable points if you want to maintain a balanced start by paying for skills, additional colonists and equipment from a pool of available points. Disable points to prepare your starting colonists with no limitations.
LanguageData.EdB.PrepareCarefully.FixedPoints.Tip: Enable this option to use a fixed number of {0} points instead of using a number of points that matches your random starting colonists.
LanguageData.EdB.PrepareCarefully.RandomizeRelationsh: You must remove all relationships from the colonist to enable random relationship generation.
LanguageData.EdB.PrepareCarefully.CannotDeleteRelatio: This relationship cannot be deleted because it was automatically added due to another relationship. Delete the original relationship to remove this one as well.
LanguageData.EdB.PrepareCarefully.RandomizeInjuries.T: You must remove all injuries from the colonist to enable random injury generation. Injuries will be determined based on the colonist's age.
LanguageData.EdB.PrepareCarefully.ErrorMustSelectImpl: You must select an implant procedure
LanguageData.EdB.PrepareCarefully.ErrorMustSelectSele: You must select a severity level
LanguageData.EdB.PrepareCarefully.PresetVersionNotSup: Pre-alpha 13 versions of presets are not supported.
LanguageData.EdB.PrepareCarefully.SavedColonistVersio: Pre-alpha 13 versions of saved colonists are not supported.
